thorwin.math.geo

Class Rectangle2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.Rectangle2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Rectangle2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Axis aligned rectangle in 2-dimensional space. The rectangle is defined using reference point (P1), a width and height. Note that width and height may be negative.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • grow

        public Rectangle2D grow(double dx,
                        double dy)
        Grows this rectangle by the given amount. The given amount is added to both sides of the rectangle. This means that both reference point and dimension of the rectangle is changed.
        Parameters:
        dx - value to add to left and to right of the rectangle
        dy - value to add to top and bottom of the rectangle
        Returns:
        enlarged rectangle

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Rectangle2D other)
        Determines if this rectangle shares any area with another.
        Parameters:
        other - rectangle
        Returns:
        true if the rectangle intersects with this one
